LanguageData.RWP_setting_repairThresholdInt_desc: Determines the hit-points percentage for colonists to start repairing damaged things. Colonists will not repair things with HP above this percentage.
LanguageData.RWP_setting_haulRottables_desc: Haulers will haul rottable items (corn, meals etc.) before generic things.
LanguageData.RWP_setting_haulDeterioratables_desc: Haulers will haul items which deteriorate over time (weapons, wood etc.) before generic things.
LanguageData.RWP_setting_haulDeterioratables_HealthTh: If "Prioritise hauling deterioratables" is enabled, skip items if their current health falls below this percentage.
